name: Sheets Organizer
tagline: The first add-on to manage Google Sheets tabs efficiently
description: Sheets Organizer helps you organize sheets into folders, sync sheets formatting, pin most used sheets, search sheets by color and name, and perform bulk actions.

name: Ultracite v6
tagline: Opinionated, zero-config code linter and formatter
description: Ultracite is a highly opinionated, zero-configuration linter and formatter, designed to help you and your AI models write consistent and type-safe code without the hassle of configuration.

name: Swetrix
tagline: Open source, cookieless Google Analytics alternative
description: An intuitive Google Analytics alternative. Swetrix comes with real time traffic analysis, website speed monitoring, marketing funnels, sales tracking, errors tracking, sessions, geolocation data and more! 100% open-source and selfhostable.

name: SnapDraw
tagline: Keep Screenshots Always on Top
description: Cut out any area of your screen and keep it floating in the foreground. Set fixed areas to capture repeatedly without repositioning. Perfect for creators with powerful drawing and annotation tools.

name: PoemCam
tagline: Automatically adds short poems to your photos, for free.
description: PoemCam turns your photos into short poetic images. Take a picture, and a verse appears that matches the mood ‚Äî gentle, quiet, or nostalgic. No account, no payment, no ads. Just capture how it feels, not only how it looks.

name: Screen Ruler
tagline: Made to measure. Built for everything else.
description: Screen Ruler is the complete inspection suite for web developers and designers. Measure elements, catch accessibility issues, extract colors and assets, and inspect CSS properties

name: Blixy
tagline: Fonts & Themes Keyboard
description: Transform your iOS keyboard with vibrant pastel, anime-inspired, and fully customizable themes. Elevate your typing anywhere ‚Äì from chats and messages to Instagram posts, TikTok captions, bios, and beyond ‚Äì with trendy fonts, cute kaomoji, and a wide array of symbols!

name: PRs MenuBar
tagline: Stay on top of your pull requests from your Mac menu bar
description: PRS Menubar is a lightweight macOS app for developers. Track pull requests from Github/Gitlab/Gitea directly from the menu bar, open them instantly, and get automatic updates.

name: pheebo
tagline: Grammarly for your AI math
description: pheebo is a Chrome extension that automatically detects mathematical errors in LLMs, guarding your back and simplifying your workflow.

name: Gatsbi
tagline: AI Co-Scientist for Research and Writing
description: Gatsbi generates research ideas, drafts scientific papers, and performs systematic reviews and meta-analyses with accurate citations and clear visuals.

name: Voicely: AI Notes and Reminders
tagline: Turn Your Voice into Notes and  Smart Reminders
description: Simply speak naturally, and Voicely instantly converts your words into voice notes, smart reminders, and categorized notes, no typing needed. It understands your intent, automatically detects smart tags, dates and times.

name: Retro App Icons - by Iconcraft
tagline: Create 2010s skeuomorphic app icons for your next project
description: üíΩüì∫üìª Added ‚Äò2010s‚Äô skeuomorphic style to IconCraft (a tool to create beautiful app icons) This style generates retro app icons with wood grain, glass effects, metal finishes, realistic lighting and shadows, all the tactile details we used to love that got lost with flat design.

name: PFPMaker
tagline: Your personal AI profile picture studio
description: We've been fixing bad profile pictures since 2020. Now we're doing it even better. PFPMaker v2 generates professional AI headshots and lifestyle photos from a single selfie. Experiment with different looks, appear in dream destinations, and create impossible-to-capture moments without leaving home. Chat with AI to edit anything, or use 27+ specialized tools with 1,100+ AI styles. Start with 9 free tools - no registration needed (now and forever). New styles and tools are added constantly.

name: Analystra
tagline: Real-time website analytics | privacy-first visitor tracking
description: Analystra is a privacy-first, developer-friendly analytics platform ‚Äî an affordable alternative to GA. Track multiple domains, deliver stats via API for your SaaS users, and soon get AI-powered insights to spot trends automatically.

name: Hey AI, Generate Me ‚Äî Original Music
tagline: A 100-hour MV about humans, AI, and the will to create.
description: I'm C.River, a 44-year-old creator from Japan. I quit my job to rebuild the dreams I once gave up and spent over 2,500 hours creating my own interactive website, plus 100 hours producing this music video. ‚ÄúHey AI, Generate Me‚Äù is a story told through music ‚Äî about humans, AI, and the blurred line between control and creation. üé¨ Watch it on YouTube: https://youtu.be/9nnyOz6y7Fo It‚Äôs never too late to start something new.

name: Zap For Laravel
tagline: The Missing Calendar Management System For Laravel
description: A flexible, performant, and developer-friendly calendar management system for Laravel. Created by Ludovic Gu√©net. (Laravel Jutsu)

name: Brain Dump
tagline: Capture your ideas instantly
description: A minimal, instant capture tool for your ideas, tasks, and notes. Type, hit enter, and it's saved across all your devices. Brain Dump helps you organize thoughts, manage tasks, and never lose an idea again.

name: Transmonkey
tagline: The AI Translation Platform That Actually Gets the Job Done
description: TransMonkey is an AI-powered translation platform that goes way beyond simple text translation. The platform supports more than 130 languages and handles multiple content formats including documents, images, videos, and audio files What sets it apart is its ability to maintain formatting while translating. You can upload a PDF, Word document, Excel sheet, or even an image, and get back a translated version that looks exactly like the original

name: PikaIA
tagline: Minimal Open Source Vibe Coding Tool
description: Open-source AI app builder. Write a spec, get a working HTML app. Single file, BYOK (OpenRouter), 10+ models from free to premium. Split-screen: spec editor on left, live preview on right. Reverse-engineer HTML back to specs. Refine with natural language. Switch models mid-project. Device preview (desktop/tablet/mobile). Export standalone HTML. MIT licensed. Runs in browser. Data stays local. No subscription.

name: Find Co-Founders who share your values
tagline: Build Dream Team
description: Wrong cofounder can cost wasted years and money. With this tool you will find the right people fast.
